passive1.name: Spoils of War
passive1.effects: Grants a charge every 40 seconds, up to 2 charges. Melee basic attacks can consume one charge to execute minions below 200 − 285 (based on level) (+ 100% AD) health. Killing a minion by any means with a charge heals you and the nearest allied champion for 5 − 30 (based on missing health) health and grants them kill gold. Healing is halved if the owner is ranged. These effects require an allied champion to be nearby.

passive2.name: Quest
passive2.effects: Earn 750 using this item and upgrade to Timeworn Targon's Brace. Reward

other.limit: Limited to 1 Jungle or Gold Income item.
